content: 1 wyatt socks pattern by kay litton wyatt s socks -- crazy sock lady designs -- kay litton -- not for commercial use for help or questions please email kay at crazysockladydesigns@gmail com 2 supply list yarn 1 skein of fingering weight yarn 100grams yarn used mrs crosby loves to play/train case base/peacock colorway 425 yds / 100g needles size us 1 / 2 25mm needles gauge 7-8 stitches per inch in stockinette stitch notions stitch marker tapestry needle for weaving in ends key st - stitch k knit p purl k2tog knit 2 stitches together p2tog purl 2 stitches together ssk slip slip knit slip 2 stitches together knitwise one at a time then knit together through the back loop sl slip_stitch purlwise with yarn in back *unless otherwise noted instructions pattern is written for small medium large cuff co 56 64 72 work k2 p2 ribbing for a total of 20 rounds or your preferred length continue on to patterned section wyatt s socks -- crazy sock lady designs -- kay litton -- not for commercial use for help or questions please email kay at crazysockladydesigns@gmail com 3 pattern this is only worked along the front of the socks the first 28 32 36 stitches will be in the following pattern the back of the leg you will k all stitches as noted **please be sure to work the correct section for the size that you have cast on small 56 st round 1 p1 k4 p4 3 times k3 knit rest of round round 2 p2 k4 p4 3 times k2 knit rest of round round 3 p3 k4 p4 3 times k1 knit rest of round round 4 p4 k4 p4 3 times knit rest of round round 5 k1 p4 k4 3 times p3 knit rest of round round 6 k2 p4 k4 3 times p2 knit rest of round round 7 k3 p4 k4 3 times p1 knit rest of round round 8 k4 p4 3 times k4 knit rest of round medium 64 st round 1 p1 k4 p4 3 times k4 p3 knit rest of round round 2 p2 k4 p4 3 times k4 p2 knit rest of round round 3 p3 k4 p4 3 times k4 p1 knit rest of round round 4 p4 k4 p4 3 times k4 knit rest of round round 5 k1 p4 k4 p4 3 times k3 knit rest of round round 6 k2 p4 k4 p4 3 times k2 knit rest of round round 7 k3 p4 k4 p4 3 times k1 knit rest of round round 8 k4 p4 4 times knit rest of round wyatt s socks -- crazy sock lady designs -- kay litton -- not for commercial use for help or questions please email kay at crazysockladydesigns@gmail com 4 large 72 st round 1 p1 k4 p4 4 times k3 knit rest of round round 2 p2 k4 p4 4 times k2 knit rest of round round 3 p3 k4 p4
